notifications.email-ns: This browser doesn't support it yet.

hero.desc: Hello. I'm Patrick, a frontend & mobile developer with 3 years of commercial development experience. I specialize in creating modern responsive websites, browser extensions, progressive web applications, mobile apps, client-side code optimization, and much more. I enjoy writing code from scratch but can also provide HTML, CSS, and JS packaged into a modern web framework. I create high-quality products through a proven software development process.
hero.subtitle: Follow me

dbbetb-e46b8r8b54e3f.title: IGPlus
dbbetb-e46b8r8b54e3f.desc: An Instagram extension that allows users to disable Reels, Stories, recommendations, vanity metrics, and customize themes, fonts, and more. Has ~6000 active users across all platforms.

db64-be4dbf8r8b54e3f.title: GPT 3.5 / 4 Automation CLI Tool
db64-be4dbf8r8b54e3f.desc: A CLI tool with pipelines for automated posts generation using OpenAI GPT 3.5 / 4. It offers combining post chunks, post validations, paraphraser for each or random strings (to avoid plagiarism and AI detection), Unsplash API relative images search, multi-accounts, and more.

db64-betnrwnrt45v4gn.title: LichessHelper
db64-betnrwnrt45v4gn.desc: Extension for Lichess. Adds new themes, pieces, boards, fonts, and features such as annoying popups disable, modern layout, coordinates on each square, and many more. Available for Google Chrome, Firefox, and MS Edge.

db64-be46bmyr8b54egf.title: ChessHelper for Chess.com
db64-be46bmyr8b54egf.desc: It has almost the same features as LichessHelper, but for Chess.com. Has ~2200 active users across all platforms. Most of the pieces and boards were created by me, while others are sourced from the web under the GNU/CC0 licenses.

db64-be46b8rht53f.title: Parallax Gallery
db64-be46b8rht53f.desc: Gallery project with a smooth parallax effect. Lightweight and efficient, comprising only ~100 lines of code.

db64-rt46b8r8b543f.title: SpoPlus Extension for Spotify
db64-rt46b8r8b543f.desc: An extension that enables customization and personalization of the web version of Spotify. Set up new themes, fonts, remove annoying notifications, popups, and more. ~6400 active users on all platforms.

db64-betnrgn-ntrt44v4gn.title: Chess in Browser
db64-betnrgn-ntrt44v4gn.desc: Chess game in the browser. Developed using OOP, TypeScript, with mobile support. Currently implemented features include pieces capture, main pieces move rules, and en passant. In progress are short and long castle, checks, checkmate, kings' single square gap, and more.

db64-be46b8r8b54e3f.title: TrainingPeaks
db64-be46b8r8b54e3f.desc: Monitoring for personal training with three main resources: plans, daily feelings, and workouts. Each section is customizable, allowing users to easily drag and drop training sessions from one day to another. Additionally, it provides weekly statistics.

dbf0-beqr56b8r8brbe5l.title: OnlineStats.com
dbf0-beqr56b8r8brbe5l.desc: Service for monitoring users publicly shared online status in Telegram Messenger. Utilizes JWT Auth, bizcharts charts, final-form for forms. Also it offers i18n locales and a dark theme.

dbf0-beqr0b890eq9r8b98.title: Music App
dbf0-beqr0b890eq9r8b98.desc: ReactJS & Redux Music player. Contains usable mobile version, localStorage cache. Works with AudioSession Api, so browser features like hotkey buttons (Next/Prev, album preview) work correctly.

fbd07wavab0987erab709adb.title: Anydo
fbd07wavab0987erab709adb.desc: To-do list application, includes all CRUD operations (add, update, read or delete any task), sorting by tags, and JWT Auth. It also has a mobile version with Safari viewport and other improvements.

fadb0978a8f90b7986da0968.title: Twitter Clone
fadb0978a8f90b7986da0968.desc: Utilizes final-form validation for form handling, allows posting tweets, has routings for both guests and logged-in users, and tweets fetching.

0879fbd9078adfb0a7dfb908.title: Nolk Landing Page
0879fbd9078adfb0a7dfb908.desc: Responsive template with SVG animations and a simple 3-step email form. Built on JS, utilizes Gulp as the main task runner.

a79e04bc-4bf4-4d23-b23d-c2c8221a6180.title: Matro UI
a79e04bc-4bf4-4d23-b23d-c2c8221a6180.desc: üëÅÔ∏è Highly optimized UI Components in one, tiny package for your React Applications.

d0c97369-e345-4759-a619-0520d4e58274.title: docusaurus-plugin-fix-react
d0c97369-e345-4759-a619-0520d4e58274.desc: Fixes the issue when npm package / exported Component uses React import, so webpack resolves it not from global node_modules/react but instead from package directory.

8fc7da5b-799a-4415-b0ef-f2633b0e55a6.title: Amazon Research Tool
8fc7da5b-799a-4415-b0ef-f2633b0e55a6.desc: Discover Amazon product info, find best prices, leverage SEO keywords, locate top suppliers with Reverse ASIN, and more. Available on the Google Chrome Store and Firefox Add-ons.

sbbetb-l43b8r4b54e3f.title: NorithalCV Pure
sbbetb-l43b8r4b54e3f.desc: Wordpress theme, designed for professionals and creatives who need a snappy, lightweight solution to showcase their skills and achievements. Whether you‚Äôre creating a CV, portfolio, or minimalist blog, this theme is an excellent choice.
